text: “Ndipo tidampatsa (Ibrahim mwana wotchedwa) Ishaq ndi (mdzukulu wotchedwa) Ya’qub. Onse tidawaongola. Nayenso Nuh tidamuongola kale (asadadze Mneneri Ibrahim). Ndipo kuchokera m’mbumba yake (Nuh, tidamuongola) Daud, Sulaiman, Ayubu, Yûsuf, Mûsa, ndi Harun. Ndipo umo ndi momwe timawalipirira ochita zabwino
